title: I did the wrong thing.
body:
So I got chat restricted, honestly for good reason too. I totally flamed someone, and said a nasty thing, and I deserved to play 10 games with limited chat experience i'm fine with that.
My honor reset and I've unlocked it.
I Just wanted to know, will I not be getting any rewards? I have unlocked my honor, and been a good summoner, but I just really don't want to be diamond and have 0 rewards, especially since I do play the champ the skin is coming out for and of course my boarder. 
I enjoy the game, and I haven't been toxic in a long time, I just don't want 1 game to suddenly decide i don't get anything for my grind this year. Just because it also happened to be close to the end.

replies.body: You ain't getting the rewards man. It takes ages to get to lvl 2 honour. Gl on ur journey doe
In order to receive ranked rewards at the end of the season, you'll need to be Honour 2+, as per the "[Season Rewards](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068)" support page.

props to you for accepting your chat restriction, unlike the majority of people that say they didnt deserve to be banned
but sadly im pretty sure you wont be getting any rewards and youll get nothing
IIRC you dont get season rewards if you are below honor 2
